How often do you use your mobile banking: I use my mobile banking app at least once a week to check my balances and transaction history.

What features do you wish your current b: I wish my current banking app had more options for budgeting and saving, as well as better communication tools with customer service representatives.

What are your financial goals in the sho: My short-term financial goals are to save up for a vacation and to pay off some credit card debt.

What are your financial goals in the lon: My long-term financial goals are to save for retirement and to eventually own a home.
